Class Keyboard

java.lang.Object
com.codeforall.simplegraphics.keyboard.Keyboard
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, EventListener
public class Keyboard extends Object implements KeyListener
Instantiate a Keyboard for obtaining key handling capability
